text: Juan Acosta (born 16 April 1907, date of death unknown) was a Chilean long- distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Chilean male long-distance runners Category:Chilean male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Chile Category:Sportspeople from Santiago
title: Juan Acosta (athlete)
